content: Stream created by Tien Thai.

Basically, we have 2 proportion measures and we are planning to create a composite measure that combines these two measures to produce a single performance rate and our preferred scoring method is the "Linear Combinations". As outlined in the Blue Print, the "Linear Combinations" is one of the Composite Scoring Methods and "Patient-Level Linear" is not one of them. However, in the MAT, "Patient-Level Linear" is one of the 3 supported composite scoring methods but "Linear Combinations" is not listed there. Are "Linear Combinations" and "Patient-Level Linear" scoring methods the same? Your response is appreciated.

Regards,
Tien Thai
